results.title: I.A.A.F. track and field events, Helsinki
results.creator_credit: Guy Butler and International Amateur Athletic Federation
results.brief_description: Documentary highlights of the diverse sectors of the Helsinki 1952 Olympic Games ranging from the Opening Ceremony to specific events, ie field, high jump, long jump. Shows respective winners at these events and the lead up to their victory. Silent film with English subtext.

results.title: I Wouldn't Like to Be the Bait
results.brief_description: Take a wonderful journey through the rich and varied fishing areas of South Australia. A geographic presentation gives us not only a tapestry of the best fishing areas, but also a beautifully cinematic vision of the magnificent Southern Coastline. The Murray Valley, Coorong, Eyre and York Peninsulas, and the Spencer and Flinders Gulfs are explored, and sophisticated graphics give both an insight into the best season to fish and the species to be caught in those areas. A summary of the tourist facilities and other attractions is also presented, which makes this program the ideal guide to the coastal and freshwater recreational areas of South Australia.

results.title: I was there
results.creator_credit: Kristian Ryhammer, Central Film O and Teamfilm AS
results.brief_description: A survey of the modern integrated transport system in Norway - a rail ticket entitles you to travel by train, boat or bus and you may break your journey when and where you like. Shows the modern cities, historic buildings, old fishing villages and the spectacular scenery. (Awards: Lisboa)

results.title: I am here today (TEFC)
results.brief_description: A record of how 21 children aged 5, 6 and 7 interacted with each other as they made various things in the playroom. The children were from the same class, growing and changing together in the classroom since the previous September. Filmed in May 1969. A film study for teachers.

results.title: I'm seventeen, I'm pregnant and I don't know what to do
results.creator_credit: David Crommie and Lee Mendelson Film Productions
results.brief_description: Dramatizes the plight of an unwed pregnant adolescent. With her parents, social workers and a discussion group at the Children’s Home Society of California, she considers the alternatives of abortion, forced marriage, temporary foster care, keeping the baby or relinquishing it for adoption.
